text: @VancityReynolds @foodbankscanada @FeedingAmerica @blakelively COVID-19 is an asshole!....is there anything Green Lantern can do to save us??? Lol just messing Ryan...Josh brolin did give you some stick over that film which was funny when you both was over here in England.
